message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $12000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $10500. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
